section.name: Maven XMLFit Plugin usage
section.source: <plugin> <groupId>net.sourceforge.xmlfit</groupId> <artifactId>xmlfit-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>0.0.2</version> <configuration> <!-- by default target/fit --> <outputDirectory>target/xmlfit</outputDirectory> <!-- by default src/test/xmlfit --> <sourceDirectory>src/test/xmlfit</sourceDirectory> <!-- by default **/Test*.xml , **/*Test.xml , **/*TestCase.xml --> <includes> <include>**/*Test.xml</include> </includes> <excludes> <exclude>**/*IntegrationTest.xml</exclude> </excludes> </configuration> </plugin>
